alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sullivan, northern Wayne and north central Pike Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rutledgedale, or 11 miles north of Honesdale, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lackawaxen, Bethel, Damascus, Callicoon, Tusten, Cochecton, Lava, Fosterdale, Narrowsburg and Hortonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
